sentences.en: He carefully wrote his name on the flyleaf.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的名字工工整整地写在书的衬页上.

sentences.en: She sent him a novel with the inscription on the flyleaf.
sentences.cn: 她送他一本蝴蝶页上有题辞的小说.

sentences.en: The jacket flyleaf said her poems strike a responsive chord with readers.
sentences.cn: 该书扉页上的评论说她的诗歌可以引起读者心灵的共鸣.

sentences.en: This volume is foxed on the flyleaf.
sentences.cn: 这卷书的空白页发黄了.

trans.tran_en: The flyleaf of a book is a page at the front that has nothing printed on it
